Html:
Hi,

I am trying to automate a WPF application. To generate a detailed test reports for the test runs, I tried to convert TRX to HTML using with the help of trx2html exe.

The report provides the tests that are executed along with the status. But I do not receive any comments/message which I've used in the script when I data drive. For single iteration I am able to see messages for failed test cases alone.

Can anyone let me know whether the report works fine when the test is data driven. Also, can we get some messages for both Pass and Fail.

Any help will be highly appreciated

Thanks,
Harini S
